data.oai_dc:dc: final_soap_GNV120025.fa: Assembly of Hemiargus ceraunus from Genbank SRA accession #SRR1299274, using multiple kmers (13,23,33,43,63) with SOAPdenovo-Trans v1.01. Different Kmer assemblies were combined with cd-hit-est and processed with the fastx toolkit. See Kawahara and Breinholt (2014) for more details.
